name: Doomsday Defender
description:
Read---

Use 'E' TO USE ABILITIES

Doomsday Defender is a Retro, Spaceship Bullet-hell game made for Boundless GameJam 2021.  The Theme is "One Button" so everything except for menu buttons are fully made with only using the E key and the mouse location.  

This game gets harder over time.  Use the upgrades to last longer!

CREDITS:

Coolguy: Pixel Artist
